text: Tetsuya Okayama (born 27 August 1973 in Nagoya, Aichi) is a former Japanese football player. He played as a midfielder. The last team he played for before retirement was Albirex Niigata. He then became the coach of Nagoya Grampus Eight. ==Club statistics== Club performance Club performance Club performance League League Cup Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total Season Club League Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Apps Goals Japan Japan Japan League League Emperor's Cup Emperor's Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 1992 Nagoya Grampus Eight J1 League - 0 0 0 0 0 0 1993 7 1 0 0 3 2 10 3 1994 2 0 2 1 0 0 4 1 1995 40 10 5 2 - 45 12 1996 26 9 1 0 14 2 41 11 1997 28 3 1 0 10 2 39 5 1998 30 14 4 3 4 1 38 18 1999 22 3 3 0 5 1 30 4 2000 28 6 2 0 6 3 36 9 2001 23 2 1 0 4 1 28 3 2002 28 0 3 1 4 0 35 1 2003 23 2 2 0 5 0 30 2 2004 21 4 0 0 4 1 25 5 2005 Albirex Niigata J1 League 12 0 1 0 5 0 18 0 2006 16 0 0 0 6 1 22 1 Singapore Singapore Singapore League League Singapore Cup Singapore Cup League Cup League Cup Total Total 2007 Albirex Niigata Singapore S.League 2008 30 9 1 0 0 0 31 9 Total Japan Japan 306 54 25 7 70 14 401 75 Total Singapore Singapore 30 9 1 0 0 0 31 9 Career total Career total Career total 336 63 26 7 70 14 432 84 ==References== Category:1973 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Aichi Prefecture
